input.sentences: as we walked through the entrance we saw the ferris wheel .
before going on any rides | i ate some salty food .
i felt sick so i put a towel over my face .
the sight of the ferris wheel made me sick | so i moved as far away as i could .
by the time i was far enough away | it was night .
output.sentences: I took my daughter to the fair and we rode the ferris wheel.
We gorged ourselves with salty foods, sweet desserts, and rode all the rides.
I got motion sick after riding the spinner, and my daughter threw a wet towel on my face as I lay on the sidewalk miserable.
The very sight of the ferris wheel made me sick for the rest of the day.
By night time, I was feeling a little better.
